PPLoc: ca.com/us/privacy/ for U.S. site. All non-US sites, notice can be found in Privacy link at bottom of ca.com home page.
activities:
HR DATA: The Company receives human resources data and general information relating to its current and former employees, in addition to information regarding potential future employees during the hiring process.  This information is transferred to the U.S. primarily for employment and record-keeping and administrative purposes, including but not limited to compensation, benefits, authentication of identity for system access, communication, performance evaluation, organizational structure, and general corporate business processing.  

NON-HR DATA: Company uses information from customers, prospective customers, vendors, business partners and other third parties for purposes of marketing, communications about products or services, facilitating transactions, customer support and other general commercial use.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Non-human resources data, online/offline, and Human Resources Data
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
